content: **size** s m l xl 2xl 3xl **measurements** length 54 56 58 60 62 64 cm / 21 3 22 0 22 8 23 6 24 4 25 2 ″ width 53 55 5 57 5 60 64 68 5 cm / 20 9 21 9 22 6 23 6 25 2 27 0 ″ **materials** 10 10 12 12 14 14 skeins of soft alpaca color light brown natural 42 2 2 2 2 2 2 skeins of soft alpaca color champagne 45 the cardigan is worked with 2 strands of the same color held together **needles** circular needle 4 mm us 6 and 4 5 mm us 7 40 cm 16 and 80-100 cm 32-39″ **yarn quality** soft alpaca hobbii 100 % alpaca 50 g 1 75 oz = 165 m 180 yds **gauge** 18 sts x 28 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4″ in stockinette stitch **about the pattern** the meadow sunset cardigan is worked top down in stockinette stitch with a textured pattern in the middle the top part of the back piece is worked in the flat until the bottom of the armholes from there stitches are picked up along the shoulders and stitches are increased for the neckline the front pieces are worked separately until the bottom of the armholes front pieces and back piece are joined and the body is worked stitches are picked up in the armholes and the sleeves are worked in the round on a circular needle finally the neckline ribbing and front ribbings are worked **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish 9 dutch 10 1 https //hobbii
